mapper.select: SELECT A.NAME AS NAME, B.VALUE AS SEX, A.CONTENTS AS CONTENTS, A.PRICE AS PRICE, A.IMAGE_URL AS IMAGE_URL FROM PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN DIVISION_01 B ON A.SEX_CODE = B.CODE

SELECT C.NAME, C.IMAGE_URL, B.VALUE AS SEX, C.PRICE, TO_CHAR(A.REGDATE,'YYYY/mm/dd HH24:mi:ss') AS REGDATE FROM ORDER_TABLE A LEFT JOIN PRODUCT C ON A.P_NAME = C.NAME LEFT JOIN DIVISION_01 B ON C.SEX_CODE = B.CODE WHERE A.WEB_ID = #{WEB_ID} ORDER BY A.REGDATE DESC

SELECT A.IDX , C.NAME, C.IMAGE_URL, B.VALUE AS SEX, C.PRICE, TO_CHAR(A.REGDATE,'YYYY/mm/dd HH24:mi:ss') AS REGDATE FROM BASKET A LEFT JOIN PRODUCT C ON A.NAME = C.NAME LEFT JOIN DIVISION_01 B ON C.SEX_CODE = B.CODE WHERE A.WEB_ID = #{WEB_ID} ORDER BY A.REGDATE DESC
SELECT A.NAME AS NAME, B.VALUE AS SEX, A.CONTENTS AS CONTENTS, A.PRICE AS PRICE, A.IMAGE_URL AS IMAGE_URL FROM PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN DIVISION_01 B ON A.SEX_CODE = B.CODE WHERE A.NAME = #{NAME}
select WEB_ID, WEB_PW, NAME, PHONE, SEX, EMAIL, TO_CHAR(BIRTH,'YYYY-mm-dd') AS BIRTH from USER_MASTER where WEB_ID = #{WEB_ID}
